text: The Painted Veil is a 2006 romantic drama movie that was directed by John Curran. It was based on the 1925 novel with the same name. This is the third movie version of the novel the first in 1934 and the second in 1957 called The Seventh Sin. This movie won a Golden Globe Award for Best Original Score in 2006. == Cast == * Edward Norton as Walter Fane * Naomi Watts as Kitty Garstin Fane * Toby Jones as Waddington * Diana Rigg as Mother Superior * Anthony Wong Chau Sang as Colonel Yu * Sally Hawkins as Mary * Liev Schreiber as Charles Townsend == Other websites == *Official website * Category:2006 romantic drama movies Category:Adultery in movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Chinese movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Golden Globe Award winning movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in Venice Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies set in the 1920s Category:Shanghai
